## Company-led recalls

26 November 2013

CLDA number: CLDA (13)A08

MDR number: 47-11/13

Company name: The Boots Company PLC

Product description:  
  
  * Boots Pharmaceuticals Chesty Cough Relief 100mg/5ml Oral Solution, PL 00014/0554  
  * Boots Pharmaceuticals Dry Cough Relief Oral Solution, PL 00014/0550  
  * Boots Pharmaceuticals Mucus Cough Relief 100mg/5ml Oral Solution, PL 00014/0554  
  * Boots Pharmaceuticals Paracetamol 6 years Plus 250mg/5ml Oral Solution 200ml, PL 00014/0619  
  * Boots Pharmaceuticals Ibuprofen 3 Months plus 100mg/5ml Oral suspension Strawberry flavour, PL 00014/0652  
  * Almus Ibuprofen 3 Months plus 100mg/5ml Oral suspension Strawberry flavour. PL 00014/0652  
  
Batch number/ expiry: See Appendix 1

Brief description of problem:

A potential manufacturing fault with the tamper seal on some Boots Pharmaceuticals liquid medicines has been identified, which may result in small pieces of plastic being found in the medicine.  

No evidence of defective product has been identified in the market; Boots Pharmaceuticals have taken the precautionary measure to recall stock of the listed batches to patient level.

These products are supplied solely by Boots stores, and customers are being contacted via Advantage Card and Parenting Club, to ask them to return these products to Boots stores for a refund or replacement with a similar item.

Company contact for stock enquiries: Boots Customer Care on 0800 915 0004

Lisa Bingham on 0115 959516
